body_html:
This is caused by "pred = array_ops.reshape(pred, [1])" in smart_select in tensorflow/python/layers/normalization.py.

pred is a scalar Tensor of boolean type. However, the GPU kernel of reshape doesn't support boolean type, because of the type constraint here.
@vrv, do you have some ideas why boolean is not supported?

@fchollet, @sguada, as pred is a scalar, could this reshape be replaced by something else?
